HTML5 Boilerplate

HTML5 Boilerplate is a professional front-end template for building fast, robust, and adaptable web apps or sites.

Less

Less is the most popular, JavaScript-based CSS preprocessor, perfect for working with your Node project.

Skeleton

A modern alternative to Bootstrap, Skeleton uses less markup and has a cooler name.
